Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='KSI03')

BibliographicData.Title: Reevaluation of the primary motor cortex connections with the thalamus in primates.

BrainSite.FullName: body representation of MI as defined in KSI03
hand representation in MI as described in GLKR84
Leg region of the primary motor cortex
